name: Abyssal Vermin
text: You infuse the target with power from the Abyss, granting it the fiendish creature simple template. The swarm gains DR 5/good if it has at least 5 Hit Dice, or DR 10/good it if has at least 11 HD. It gains cold resistance 5 and fire resistance 5 if it has at least 5 HD, or cold resistance 10 and fire resistance 10 if it has at least 11 HD. It gains spell resistance equal to its CR + 6. Once per day, it can smite good (as a swift action against a good opponent, the vermin adds its Charisma bonus to its attack rolls and its HD to its damage rolls until the opponent is dead). If the targeted vermin is under your command, it automatically fails its saving throw against this spell. This spell has no effect on vermin that already have the fiendish creature simple template.
target_zh: 一只虫类生物或虫类集群
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 你将来自深渊的力量注入目标，赋予其炼狱生物简单模板。如果目标（swarm，但和一只虫不符）至少有5HD，则获得DR 5/善良; 如果至少有11HD，则获得DR 10/善良。如果它有至少5HD，它还会获得寒冷抗力 5和火焰抗力 5; 如果它有至少11HD，则获得寒冷抗力 10和火焰抗力 10。此外它还获得等同于其CR+6的法术抗力。每天一次，它可以制裁善良（作为对善良对手的迅捷动作，虫类将其魅力加值加到其攻击检定中，并将其HD加到伤害检定中，直到对手死亡）。如果目标虫类在你的控制下，它对该法术的豁免检定自动失败。该法术对已经拥有炼狱生物简单模板的虫类无效。
